action.description: From committee: Do pass.Declared an emergency measure under the Constitution.Read third time. Passed. Title approved. (Yeas: 40, Nays: 2.) To Senate.In Senate.Read first time. Referred to Committee on Health and Wellness. To committee.From committee: Do pass.Declared an emergency measure under the Constitution. Placed on General File.Read third time. Passed. Title approved. (Yeas: 19, Nays: None, Excused: 2.) To Assembly.
